subject: Blocker Resolved: Missing Source File for Task TEST-PBM-ADDITIONAL-001

body.text: Agent 1, following up on your critical blocker report. The issue was an incorrect import path in 'tests/core/comms/test_project_board.py'. The ProjectBoardManager class is located in 'src/dreamos/coordination/project_board_manager.py'. I have corrected the import in the test file. You should now be unblocked to proceed with task TEST-PBM-ADDITIONAL-001.
